name: Russian Bottle Flip 3D
description:
New Bottle Flip challenge 3d Arcade in Russia!
Flip the water bottle! Try get max score and open new levels!
- Real Russian environment level!
- Cool graphics!
- Real physics!

Do it many times everything!

Simple bottle control:
- first touch for set force
- second touch - set rotation speed!

Be a master of Russian Bottle Flip 3d Challenge!
Can you beat your friends in this app?
Try to get best score!!!
